content: #noob alert :) Starting with the Audit Event, using the HL7.Fhir.Stu3 nuget (c#). Can someone tell me how to get json that can validate against the AuditEvent ? Or, alternatively, provide a valid AuditEvent json example ( this will not validate https://www.hl7.org/fhir/auditevent-example.json.html )
auditevent-example.json validates quite allright on Vonk, that uses the same .NET validator (see here how). You could post more specific errors on the #dotnet stream.
Removed as this topic was moved to #dotnet when the answer is.
